name: KTM SX-F 250/350 Stealth Kit
description: Full graphic kit for KTM SX-F 250/350. Printed on 3M cast vinyl with UV-resistant laminate. Includes shroud, tank, fork guard, and side plate graphics. Fits 2023–2025 models.

name: Husqvarna FE 350 Coyote Kit
description: Enduro graphic kit with Coyote Tan colourway. Designed for the Husqvarna FE 350. 3M cast vinyl with UV laminate.

name: Yamaha YZ250F Acid Kit
description: Acid Lime signature kit for Yamaha YZ250F. Fits 2024–2025 models. Full shroud, tank and fork guard graphics.

name: Honda CRF 450R Stealth Kit
description: Stealth Charcoal full kit for Honda CRF 450R. Fits 2021–2024 models.

name: KTM SX-F Gripper Seat Cover
description: Gripper seat cover matched to Griffix graphic kits. Ribbed gripper surface for maximum control. Fits KTM SX-F 250/350/450 2023–2025.

name: Custom Number Plate Kit
description: Custom printed number plates, set of 3 (front + two sides). Choose your number, background and font. Universal fit — trimmed to shape.
